briefTitle: Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of Eziclen in Adult Subjects Undergoing Colonoscopy
officialTitle: Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of a Split-dose of a New Bowel Cleansing Preparation (Eziclen) in Adult Subjects Undergoing Colonoscopy: A Phase III, Multicentre, Randomised, 2 Parallel Group, Comparative Versus Fortrans®, Non-inferiority, Investigator-blinded Study
summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate that Eziclen is non-inferior to Fortrans® (the reference colonic lavage in Russia) administered in adult subjects scheduled to undergo colonoscopy for a routinely accepted diagnostic indication.

primaryOutcome.measure: Adjusted Percentage of Patients With Successful Overall Colon Preparation, Assessed by the Global Score of the Boston Bowel Preparation Scale (BBPS).
